doc.title: A Swan Song of Rare and Vanishing Beauty
doc.plot: "Bookends" around the concert of 'Jacqueline du Pré' (qv) playing the Elgar Cello Concerto with the New Philharmonia Orchestra conducted by her husband 'Daniel Barenboim' (qv) with extra footage showing more details of Jacqueline's life when young and after she was diagnosed with Multiple Sclerosis in 1973 which cut a brilliant career tragically short.
